name: Die on a Roll
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Use the mouse pointer to roll around the level. Avoid all and everything in your way to earn the highest score! The theme for the game jam was: Roll of the Dice. While the game quite literally is a roll of the die, there are also elements of randomness and luck. Thank you for playing!

Mouse - Move

R - Restart

Esc - Quit (Windows)

Made by wilzet
